alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Ottawa (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 12:26AM EDT until August 24 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ottawa County in northwestern Ohio... Northeastern Lucas County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 115 AM EDT. * At 1225 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles east of Monroe to near Port Clinton, moving southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Sandusky, Port Clinton, Kelleys Island, Put-In-Bay, Oak Harbor, Genoa, Elmore, Catawba Island, Marblehead, Rocky Ridge, Clay Center, Reno Beach, Williston and Bono. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
